biography.bio: Yanfen Fang was born in 1929 in Guangdong, China. She is an actress, known for Zao zhi dang cu wo bu jia (1956), Hong fen piao ling wei liao qing (1955) and How Madame Zhao Went Far and Wide in Search of Her Husband (1959).
biography.name: Yanfen Fang

biography.placeOfBirth: Zhongshan County, Guangdong Province, Hong Kong
biography.bio: Fung Fung was born on January 1, 1920 in Zhongshan County, Guangdong Province, Hong Kong as Rusheng Feng. He was an actor and director, known for La danse du lion (1980), Xiadao Qinghua (1950) and Xi lu xiang (1950). He died on February 16, 2000 in Hong Kong.
biography.name: Fung Fung

biography.bio: Ching Lee was born in 1912 in China. He was an actor, known for Zhujiang lei (1950), Fenghuo Guxiang (1941) and Wang lao wu zhi lian (1959). He was married to Siuyi Yung. He died on July 14, 2000 in Hong Kong, China.
biography.name: Ching Lee

biography.bio: Wo Li is known for his work on Shaolin Challenges Ninja (1978), The Kid with the Golden Arm (1979) and Tiger Killer (1983).
biography.name: Wo Li

biography.bio: Cho-Fan Ng was born in 1910 in Tianjin, China. He was an actor and writer, known for Ren hai gu hong (1960), Ai (1955) and Xue ran du juan hong (1951). He died on February 23, 1993 in Canada.
biography.name: Cho-Fan Ng

biography.bio: Chor-San Wong was born in 1905 in China. He was an actor and production manager, known for Fu zhi guo (1953), She Zi Feng Gu (1938) and Pipa Xing (1938). He died in 1991 in the USA.
biography.name: Chor-San Wong
